definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: He hoped for the best, hoped Saber and the others would be okay.
sentences.chinese: 他往好的方面考慮，希望馬刀小隊和其他人都會很好。

sentences.english: Never jerk the horse's mouth while making any of the movements with the saber.
sentences.chinese: 當用馬刀進行每一次刺出時，不要猛拉馬的嘴。

sentences.english: At this time, saw a mantis sword play, to seize a dragonfly.
sentences.chinese: 這時，只見螳螂一個揮馬刀，把蜻蜓抓住了。

sentences.english: Use this treatment by 9 months later, the cancer got smaller Obviously.
sentences.chinese: 伽馬刀治療九個月後隨訪圖片，腫瘤明顯縮小。

sentences.english: Rings or other targets which offer no resistance to the saber should not be used.
sentences.chinese: 不應該用對馬刀沒有任何抵抗力的環或其他目標物。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate gamma knife radiosurgery for adrenal gland metastases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腎上腺轉移瘤的伽馬刀治療效果。

sentences.english: Use this treatment by2 years later, the cancer almost disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 伽馬刀治療兩年後，腫瘤消失。

sentences.english: He stripped a tree with his sabre.
His face was seamed with sabre cuts.
sentences.chinese: 他的臉上留有馬刀砍下的傷痕。

sentences.english: Use this treatment by one month later, the cancer got smaller Obviously.
sentences.chinese: 伽馬刀治療後一個月，病竈明顯縮小。

sentences.english: I'm sending Team Saber, Mendez, and you ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我要讓馬刀小隊，門德茲和你先進去。
